pkgmetadata.longdescription: core_module_text_area_app=========================Text Area module for the parser core project.Quick start===========1. Add "core_module_text_area_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting-----------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_module_text_area_app', ]2. Include the core_module_text_area_app URLconf in your project urls.py------------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^', include('core_module_text_area_app.urls')),
